  * PGS01 communicate with the database
    * PGS0101 read recommended applications according to given conditions
    * PGS0102 record constrained applications, launch rules of admitted applications, and the information of constrained users

  * PGS02 recommendation engine
    * PGS0201 retrieve most popular admitted applications according to given conditions
    * PGS0202 recommend admitted applications used by similar constrained users

  * PGS03 communication with the client
    * PGS0301 handle HTTP requests from the client
    * PGS0302 record signature of HTTP requests
